note.en: A JSON pointer that identifies the OC4IDS field represented by the row.
note.es: A JSON pointer that identifies the OC4IDS field represented by the row.

note.en: The data element in your data sources that matches this field's description.
note.es: The data element in your data sources that matches this field's description.

note.en: An example value for the data element selected in the mapping column, from the '(Source) 2. Data elements' sheet.
note.es: An example value for the data element selected in the mapping column, from the '(Source) 2. Data elements' sheet.

note.en: Notes about the mapping for this field, for example how you will calculate the fields value, or how you will convert your data element to the correct type.
note.es: Notes about the mapping for this field, for example how you will calculate the fields value, or how you will convert your data element to the correct type.

note.en: The CoST IDS elements to which this field relates. Only elements selected in the '(CoST) IDS Elements' sheet are shown.
note.es: The CoST IDS elements to which this field relates. Only elements selected in the '(CoST) IDS Elements' sheet are shown.
